messages.subject: Another cool reason to come to the Northeast Unschooling Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Have you ever been to a Scholastic Book Fair Warehouse Sale? Picture a huge room with tons of Scholastic books (which are usually drastically discounted
messages.messageBody:
Have you ever been to a Scholastic Book Fair Warehouse Sale? Picture a huge
room with tons of Scholastic books (which are usually drastically discounted
anyway) at even greater discounts. Also toys, supplies, all kinds of things--
really cheap and abundant.

Well, this year they are offering one of their Warehouse Sales in Peabody,
MA, the Thursday and Friday before the conference starts, EIGHT MINUTES FROM
THE CONFERENCE HOTEL!!!!!!!! The details are:

Spring Hill Suites/Boston/Peabody
43 Newbury Street
Peabody, MA 01960
Thu., 05/22/2008 - Fri., 05/23/2008
Thursday 12:00PM-8:00PM
Friday 10:00AM-6:00PM

If you go here: _http://www.scholastic.com/bookfairs/events/warehouse/_
(http://www.scholastic.com/bookfairs/events/warehouse/) you can get more details
and sign up for a pass that will allow you to get in faster AND give you a
coupon.

Did I mention I love this thing? It's insane to do on conference weekend,
but I will be going!

Kathryn

Come to the Northeast Unschooling conference Memorial Day Weekend, May 23-25
2008 in Peabody, Massachusetts _www.northeastunschoolingconference.com_
(http://www.northeastunschoolingconference.com/)




**************Create a Home Theater Like the Pros. Watch the video on AOL
Home.
